feed.title: Endless Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Endless: Support for extractor updates
entry.content:
v0.3

  • This release adds support for on-demand extractor updates. This way you can update the list of extractors without needing to update the app itself.
  • It also shows the latest upvote/comment on the front page.

entry.title: New release for Endless: Front page posts feed with sorting
entry.content:
• Adds several sorting functions to see hot/new/top/controversial posts on your home page.
  • Adds option to change the default endless server address
  • Views extractors based on their "hidden" attribute

entry.title: New release for Endless: v0.5
entry.content:
Spotify support & design changes

  • Adds spotify support for viewing albums/artists/playlists/tracks
  • New design for posts and single posts

entry.title: New release for Endless: v0.6
entry.content:
• Brings support for exporting and importing backups.
  • Backups include all upvotes and comments along with their identifiers.
